thread.title: Missouri Reporter Explains the Midwest to the Rest of Us
thread.title_full: Missouri Reporter Explains the Midwest to the Rest of Us

author: Kevin Eck
title: Missouri Reporter Explains the Midwest to the Rest of Us
text:
© 2017 Adweek All Rights Reserved Missouri Reporter Explains the Midwest to the Rest of Us Advertisement Comment 
KRBK reporter Jeff Houghton has taken on the heavy responsibility of explaining the Midwest to all of us who live around it. 
Houghton, who works at the Springfield, Missouri Fox affiliate and starred in the We Are Fox5 promo we reported on a few weeks ago, takes the funny route, Midwest-splaining the heart of America because the networks don’t have enough reporters assigned to the area to do it for him. 
As he puts it, “The midwest is the only thing separating Canada from The South and the inevitable git’r done/I’m so sorry war.” 
Check it out:
